

TRY:
- nn inputs are state of rocket at last n timesteps
-- state of rocket and own output?

- fitness is only from the last 1 second of the run

- several phases of fitness: as long as too far from center ignore the facing, once near center reward coming to standstill.

- fitness is lexi. sorted array instead of number

- "max burn" vs "conserve fuel" objectives?

- fitness is only the highest encountered of all start conditions

- check that the rotation is able to fire at all

- increase max thrust?

- longer sim time?

- max speed when close to center?

vel : (EA will minimize speed)

1/vel : maximize speed

if far away from center doesnt matter (term disappears if dist large) : + 1/(dist - hit)^3 * 1000 * (1/vel)
                                                                          ----------------------- at 10 from hit is 1, at 2 is 100, at 1 is 1000


if close and slow add a big number
if close and fast add almost zero

- on hit multiply by time taken?


- fuzzify the thrusters? add friction?


- measure/use average speed?

- speed in direction toward the target should be maximized, not just in any direction


- if hit, modify fitness by impact angle and speed?

- either limit speed or detect collision with center through intersection to avoid rocket going through the target
-- but it could just be that after a certain speed the solutions become non solving

- dont accept backwards or sideways hit on target as valid solutions?


### PilotNet( [ 4, 4] ), f = sum of squared lengths of final positions and velocities, 10 s sim time, start pos 0,300 vel 0,0

------------------------
| Solution S_A_1 fitness 4.196366304028859e-7 

- "Oscillates" as it slowly approaches the origin which is reached after ca. 6 sec.
- In the origin the rocket wildly powers back and forth on the spot.

------------------------
| Solution S_A_2 fitness 2.5754644219082e-7

- Similar to S_A_1 but reaches origin in 3 sec. then wildly oscillates on the spot

------------------------
| Solution S_A_3 fitness 0.0000017453380463907863

- Takes almost 10 seconds to get to the origin, then same as before


### PilotNet( [ 4, 4, 4 ] ), f = sum of lengths of all positions, velocities, accel, 10 s sim time, 3 start pos

------------------------

this worked
		fitness[0] *= 0.99;
		const distRough = Math.trunc(dist / 25);
		fitness[0] += square(distRough) + (10 * avl + vel);

fitness[0] += (dist - this.hitDistance) + 1.0 / Math.pow(dist - this.hitDistance, 2) * 100 * safeInvert(vel);

[ 7, 7, 7 ]

interesting result that comes close to a "manual" control

			const hd = dist - this.hitDistance;
			fitness[0] += hd;
			v1.copy(g_model.particle.pos).normalize();
			v1.rotate(Math.PI / 2);
			const dp = Math.abs(v1.dot(g_model.particle.dir));
			fitness[0] += hd * dp;

approaches sideways? 

			const hd = dist - this.hitDistance;
			fitness[0] += hd;

			const a = Math.abs( getVec2Angle(g_model.particle.pos, g_model.particle.dir) );
			fitness[0] += hd * a;

best solution yet, steers toward center consistently and hits nose first

Evaluating start condition 91 / 120

		if(dist <= this.hitDistance) {
			// Hit nose first
			tmpV1.copy(pt.pos).normalize();
			const dp = tmpV1.dot(pt.dir);
			const diffDp = Math.abs(dp - (-1)); // 0..2, 2 (worst), 0 (best)
			if(diffDp < 0.5) {
				this.solves += 1;
				validSolve = true;
				break;
			}
			else {
				fitness[0] += 2 * this.hitDistance;
			}
		}
		else {
			const hd = dist - this.hitDistance;
			fitness[0] += hd;
			// fitness[0] += 0.5 * safeInvert(vel);
		}

			tmpV1.copy(pt.pos).normalize();

			const diffDp = Math.abs(dp - (-1)); // 0..2, 2 (worst), 0 (best)

				this.solves += 1;
				validSolve = true;
				break;
			}

				fitness[0] += 2 * this.hitDistance;

		}
...
	if(!validSolve) {
		fitness[0] *= 2;
	}
	else {
		// Maximize velocity component pointed towards center
		tmpV1.copy(pt.pos).normalize().multiplyScalar(-1);
		const dp = tmpV1.dot(pt.vel);
		const diffDp = Math.max(0, dp); // 0..
		fitness[0] *= 1 / (1 + diffDp);
	}

add this to fitness at each step
			// 
			this.tmpV1.copy(pt.pos).normalize();
			const dp = this.tmpV1.dot(pt.dir);
			const diffDp = Math.abs(dp - (-1)); // 0..2, 2 (worst), 0 (best)
			fitness[0] += diffDp;
